   20: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %%% Purpose: Test suite for the 'maps' module.
   22: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   23: 
   24: -module(maps_SUITE).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   29: 
   30: -export([t_update_with_3/1, t_update_with_4/1,
   31:          t_get_3/1, t_filter_2/1, t_filtermap_2/1,
   32:          t_fold_3/1,t_map_2/1,t_size_1/1, t_foreach_2/1,
   33:          t_iterator_1/1, t_iterator_2/1,
   34:          t_iterator_valid/1,
   35:          t_put_opt/1, t_merge_opt/1,
   36:          t_with_2/1,t_without_2/1,
   37:          t_intersect/1, t_intersect_with/1,
   38:          t_merge_with/1, t_from_keys/1,
   39:          error_info/1,
   40:          t_from_list_kill_process/1,
   41:          t_from_keys_kill_process/1,
   42:          t_values_kill_process/1,
   43:          t_keys_kill_process/1,
   44:          t_from_list_check_trapping/1,
   45:          t_from_keys_check_trapping/1,
   46:          t_keys_trapping/1,
   47:          t_values_trapping/1,
   48:          t_groups_from_list/1]).
   49: 
   50: -define(badmap(V,F,Args), {'EXIT', {{badmap,V}, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   51: -define(badkey(K,F,Args), {'EXIT', {{badkey,K}, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   52: -define(badarg(F,Args), {'EXIT', {badarg, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   53: 
   54: suite() ->
   55:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   56:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   57: 
   58: all() ->
   59:     [t_update_with_3,t_update_with_4,
   60:      t_get_3,t_filter_2,t_filtermap_2,
   61:      t_fold_3,t_map_2,t_size_1,t_foreach_2,
   62:      t_iterator_1,t_iterator_2,
   63:      t_iterator_valid,
   64:      t_put_opt,t_merge_opt,
   65:      t_with_2,t_without_2,
   66:      t_intersect, t_intersect_with,
   67:      t_merge_with, t_from_keys,
   68:      error_info,
   69:      t_from_list_kill_process,
   70:      t_from_keys_kill_process,
   71:      t_values_kill_process,
   72:      t_keys_kill_process,
   73:      t_from_list_check_trapping,
   74:      t_from_keys_check_trapping,
   75:      t_keys_trapping,
   76:      t_values_trapping,
   77:      t_groups_from_list].
   78: 
   79: t_from_list_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   80:     Killer = self(),
   81:     {Child, ChildRef} =
   82:         spawn_monitor(
   83:           fun() ->
   84:                   MapSize = 10000,
   85:                   List = [{X, X} || X <- lists:seq(1, MapSize)],
   86:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
   87:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
   88:                           case Round =:= 0 of
   89:                               true ->
   90:                                   Killer ! starting;
   91:                               false ->
   92:                                   ok
   93:                           end,
   94:                           Map = maps:from_list(List),
   95:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, maps:size(Map)]),
   96:                           Loop(Round + 1)
   97:                   end)(0)
   98:           end),
   99:     receive
  100:         starting -> ok
  101:     end,
  102:     exit(Child, kill),
  103:     %wait for exit message
  104:     receive
  105:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  106:     end,
  107:     ok.
  108: 
  109: t_from_keys_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  110:     Killer = self(),
  111:     {Child, ChildRef} =
  112:         spawn_monitor(
  113:           fun() ->
  114:                   MapSize = 10000,
  115:                   List = lists:seq(1, MapSize),
  116:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
  117:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
  118:                           case Round =:= 0 of
  119:                               true ->
  120:                                   Killer ! starting;
  121:                               false ->
  122:                                   ok
  123:                           end,
  124:                           Map = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  125:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, maps:size(Map)]),
  126:                           Loop(Round + 1)
  127:                   end)(0)
  128:           end),
  129:     receive
  130:         starting -> ok
  131:     end,
  132:     exit(Child, kill),
  133:     %wait for exit message
  134:     receive
  135:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  136:     end,
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: t_keys_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  140:     Killer = self(),
  141:     {Child, ChildRef} =
  142:         spawn_monitor(
  143:           fun() ->
  144:                   MapSize = 500000,
  145:                   List = lists:seq(1, MapSize),
  146:                   Map = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  147:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
  148:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
  149:                           case Round =:= 0 of
  150:                               true ->
  151:                                   Killer ! starting;
  152:                               false ->
  153:                                   ok
  154:                           end,
  155:                           Keys = maps:keys(Map),
  156:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, hd(Keys)]),
  157:                           Loop(Round + 1)
  158:                   end)(0)
  159:           end),
  160:     receive
  161:         starting -> ok
  162:     end,
  163:     exit(Child, kill),
  164:     %wait for exit message
  165:     receive
  166:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  167:     end,
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: t_values_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  171:     Killer = self(),
  172:     {Child, ChildRef} =
  173:         spawn_monitor(
  174:           fun() ->
  175:                   MapSize = 500000,
  176:                   List = [{V, V} || V <- lists:seq(1, MapSize)],
  177:                   Map = maps:from_list(List),
  178:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
  179:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
  180:                           case Round =:= 0 of
  181:                               true ->
  182:                                   Killer ! starting;
  183:                               false ->
  184:                                   ok
  185:                           end,
  186:                           Values = maps:values(Map),
  187:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, hd(Values)]),
  188:                           Loop(Round + 1)
  189:                   end)(0)
  190:           end),
  191:     receive
  192:         starting -> ok
  193:     end,
  194:     exit(Child, kill),
  195:     %wait for exit message
  196:     receive
  197:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  198:     end,
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: %% Check that maps:from_list/1 is trapping
  202: t_from_list_check_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  203:     FunToExecute =
  204:         fun() ->
  205:                 ListTmp = [{X,X} || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,100000)])]],
  206:                 List = [{-1,-1} | ListTmp],
  207:                 M = maps:from_list(List),
  208:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  209:                 maps:get(-1, M)
  210:         end,
  211:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, from_list, 1}),
  212:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  213:     true = NoYields > 2.
  214: 
  215: %% Check that maps:from_keys/2 is trapping
  216: t_from_keys_check_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  217:     FunToExecute =
  218:         fun() ->
  219:                 ListTmp = [X || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,1000000)])]],
  220:                 List = [-1 | ListTmp],
  221:                 M = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  222:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  223:                 _ = maps:get(-1, M),
  224:                 ok
  225:         end,
  226:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, from_keys, 2}),
  227:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  228:     true = NoYields > 2.
  229: 
  230: %% Check that maps:keys/1 is trapping
  231: t_keys_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  232:     FunToExecute =
  233:         fun() ->
  234:                 ListTmp = [X || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,1000000)])]],
  235:                 List = [-1 | ListTmp],
  236:                 M = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  237:                 Keys = maps:keys(M),
  238:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  239:                 [-1 | _] = lists:sort(Keys),
  240:                 ok
  241:         end,
  242:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, keys, 1}),
  243:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  244:     true = NoYields > 2.
  245: 
  246: %% Check that maps:values/1 is trapping
  247: t_values_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  248:     FunToExecute =
  249:         fun() ->
  250:                 ListTmp = [{X,X} || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,1000000)])]],
  251:                 List = [{-1,-1} | ListTmp],
  252:                 M = maps:from_list(List),
  253:                 Values = maps:values(M),
  254:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  255:                 [-1 | _] = lists:sort(Values),
  256:                 ok
  257:         end,
  258:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, values, 1}),
  259:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  260:     true = NoYields > 2.
  261: 
  262: count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, FunctionId) ->
  263:     Tracer = self(),
  264:     {Pid, Mon} =
  265:         spawn_monitor(
  266:           fun () ->
  267:                   erlang:trace(self(),true,[running,{tracer,Tracer}]),
  268:                   FunToExecute()
  269:           end),
  270:     receive
  271: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  272: 	    normal = Reason
  273:     end,
  274:     TD = erlang:trace_delivered(Pid),
  275:     receive
  276: 	{trace_delivered, Pid, TD} ->
  277:             trace_get_number_of_yields(Pid, FunctionId, 0)
  278:     end.
  279: 
  280: trace_get_number_of_yields(P, TrapFunc, N) ->
  281:     receive
  282: 	{trace, P, out, TrapFunc} ->
  283: 	    receive
  284: 		{trace, P, in, TrapFunc} ->
  285:                     trace_get_number_of_yields(P, TrapFunc, N+1)
  286: 	    after 0 ->
  287: 		    exit(trap_sched_mismatch)
  288: 	    end;
  289: 	{trace, P, out, Func} ->
  290: 	    receive
  291: 		{trace, P, in, Func} ->
  292: 		    trace_get_number_of_yields(P, TrapFunc, N)
  293: 	    after 0 ->
  294: 		    exit(other_sched_mismatch)
  295: 	    end
  296:     after 0 ->
  297: 	    N
  298:     end.
  299: 
  300: t_from_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  301:     Map0 = maps:from_keys(["a", 2, {three}], value),
  302:     3 = map_size(Map0),
  303:     #{"a":=value,2:=value,{three}:=value} = Map0,
  304: 
  305:     Map1 = maps:from_keys([1, 2, 2], {complex,value}),
  306:     2 = map_size(Map1),
  307:     #{1:={complex,value},2:={complex,value}} = Map1,
  308: 
  309:     Map2 = maps:from_keys([], value),
  310:     0 = map_size(Map2),
  311: 
  312:     ?badarg(from_keys,[[a|b],value]) = (catch maps:from_keys([a|b],value)),
  313:     ?badarg(from_keys,[not_list,value]) = (catch maps:from_keys(not_list,value)),
  314:     ok.
  315: 
  316: t_update_with_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  317:     V1 = value1,
  318:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
  319:     V3 = "value3",
  320:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
  321:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
  322: 
  323:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1,Fun,Map),
  324:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2,Fun,Map),
  325:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3",Fun,Map),
  326: 
  327:     %% error case
  328:     ?badmap(b,update_with,[[a,b],a,b]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),b)),
  329:     ?badarg(update_with,[[a,b],a,#{}]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),#{})),
  330:     ?badkey([a,b],update_with,[[a,b],Fun,#{}]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],Fun,#{})),
  331:     ok.
  332: 
  333: t_update_with_4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  334:     V1 = value1,
  335:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
  336:     V3 = "value3",
  337:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
  338:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
  339:     Init = 3,
  340: 
  341:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1,Fun,Init,Map),
  342:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2,Fun,Init,Map),
  343:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3",Fun,Init,Map),
  344: 
  345:     #{ key3 := Init } = maps:update_with(key3,Fun,Init,Map),
  346: 
  347:     %% error case
  348:     ?badmap(b,update_with,[[a,b],a,b]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),b)),
  349:     ?badarg(update_with,[[a,b],a,#{}]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),#{})),
  350:     ok.
  351: 
  352: 
  353: t_get_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  354:     Map = #{ key1 => value1, key2 => value2 },
  355:     DefaultValue = "Default value",
  356:     value1 = maps:get(key1, Map, DefaultValue),
  357:     value2 = maps:get(key2, Map, DefaultValue),
  358:     DefaultValue = maps:get(key3, Map, DefaultValue),
  359: 
  360:     %% error case
  361:     {'EXIT', {{badmap,a}, _}} = (catch maps:get([a,b],id(a),def)),
  362: 
  363:     ok.
  364: 
  365: t_without_2(_Config) ->
  366:     Ki = [11,22,33,44,55,66,77,88,99],
  367:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)]),
  368:     M1 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-lists:seq(1,100) -- Ki]),
  369:     M1 = maps:without([{k,I}||I <- Ki],M0),
  370: 
  371:     %% error case
  372:     ?badmap(a,without,[[a,b],a]) = (catch maps:without([a,b],id(a))),
  373:     ?badmap(a,without,[{a,b},a]) = (catch maps:without({a,b},id(a))),
  374:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},without,[[],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:without([], {0,<<>>,97})),
  375:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},without,[[false, -20, -8],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:without([false, -20, -8], {0, <<>>, 97})),
  376:     ?badarg(without,[a,#{}]) = (catch maps:without(a,#{})),
  377:     ok.
  378: 
  379: t_with_2(_Config) ->
  380:     Ki = [11,22,33,44,55,66,77,88,99],
  381:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)]),
  382:     M1 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-Ki]),
  383:     M1 = maps:with([{k,I}||I <- Ki],M0),
  384: 
  385:     %% error case
  386:     ?badmap(a,with,[[a,b],a]) = (catch maps:with([a,b],id(a))),
  387:     ?badmap(a,with,[{a,b},a]) = (catch maps:with({a,b},id(a))),
  388:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},with,[[],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:with([], {0,<<>>,97})),
  389:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},with,[[false, -20, -8],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:with([false, -20, -8], {0, <<>>, 97})),
  390:     ?badarg(with,[a,#{}]) = (catch maps:with(a,#{})),
  391:     ok.
  392: 
  393: t_filter_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  394:     M = #{a => 2, b => 3, c=> 4, "a" => 1, "b" => 2, "c" => 4},
  395:     Pred1 = fun(K,V) -> is_atom(K) andalso (V rem 2) =:= 0 end,
  396:     Pred2 = fun(K,V) -> is_list(K) andalso (V rem 2) =:= 0 end,
  397:     #{a := 2,c := 4} = maps:filter(Pred1,M),
  398:     #{"b" := 2,"c" := 4} = maps:filter(Pred2,M),
  399:     #{a := 2,c := 4} = maps:filter(Pred1,maps:iterator(M)),
  400:     #{"b" := 2,"c" := 4} = maps:filter(Pred2,maps:iterator(M)),
  401:     %% error case
  402:     ?badmap(a,filter,[_,a]) = (catch maps:filter(fun(_,_) -> true end,id(a))),
  403:     ?badmap({a,b,c},filter,[_,{a,b,c}]) = (catch maps:filter(fun(_,_) -> true end,id({a,b,c}))),
  404:     ?badarg(filter,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:filter(id(<<>>),#{})),
  405:     ok.
  406: 
  407: t_filtermap_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  408:     M0 = maps:from_list([{I, I} || I <- lists:seq(1, 30)]),
  409:     Pred = fun(K,_) when K=<10 -> true; (K,_) when K=<20 -> false; (_,V) -> {true, V * V} end,
  410:     M1 = maps:filtermap(Pred, M0),
  411:     M2 = maps:filtermap(Pred, maps:iterator(M0)),
  412:     #{1 := 1, 10 := 10, 21 := 21 * 21, 30 := 30 * 30} = M1,
  413:     false = maps:is_key(11, M1),
  414:     false = maps:is_key(20, M1),
  415:     true = M1 =:= M2,
  416:     %% error case
  417:     ?badmap(a,filtermap,[_,a]) = (catch maps:filtermap(fun(_,_) -> true end,id(a))),
  418:     ?badmap({a,b,c},filtermap,[_,{a,b,c}]) = (catch maps:filtermap(fun(_,_) -> true end,id({a,b,c}))),
  419:     ?badarg(filtermap,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:filtermap(id(<<>>),#{})),
  420:     ok.
  421: 
  422: t_fold_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  423:     Vs = lists:seq(1,200),
  424:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs]),
  425:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
  426:     Tot0 = lists:sum(Vs),
  427:     Tot1 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, M0),
  428:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot1,
  429:     Tot2 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, maps:iterator(M0)),
  430:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot2,
  431: 
  432:     %% error case
  433:     ?badmap(a,fold,[_,0,a]) = (catch maps:fold(fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,0,id(a))),
  434:     ?badmap({a,b,c},fold,[_,0,{a,b,c}]) = (catch maps:fold(fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,0,id({a,b,c}))),
  435:     ?badarg(fold,[<<>>,0,#{}]) = (catch maps:fold(id(<<>>),0,#{})),
  436:     ok.
  437: 
  438: t_map_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  439:     Vs = lists:seq(1,200),
  440:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs]),
  441:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
  442:     M1 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, M0),
  443:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M1,
  444:     M2 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, maps:iterator(M0)),
  445:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M2,
  446: 
  447:     %% error case
  448:     ?badmap(a,map,[_,a]) = (catch maps:map(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(a))),
  449:     ?badmap({a,b,c},map,[_,{a,b,c}]) = (catch maps:map(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id({a,b,c}))),
  450:     ?badarg(map,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:map(id(<<>>),#{})),
  451:     ok.
  452: 
  453: t_foreach_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  454:     %% error case
  455:     ?badmap(a,foreach,[_,a]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(a))),
  456:     ?badmap([],foreach,[_,[]]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id([]))),
  457:     ?badmap({},foreach,[_,{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id({}))),
  458:     ?badmap(42,foreach,[_,42]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(42))),
  459:     ?badmap(<<>>,foreach,[_,<<>>]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(<<>>))),
  460:     ?badmap({a,b,c},foreach,[_,{a,b,c}]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id({a,b,c}))),
  461: 
  462:     ?badarg(foreach,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(<<>>),#{})),
  463:     F0 = fun() -> ok end,
  464:     F3 = fun(_, _, _) -> ok end,
  465:     ?badarg(foreach,[F0, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(F0), #{})),
  466:     ?badarg(foreach,[F3, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(F3), #{})),
  467:     ?badarg(foreach,[a, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(a), #{})),
  468:     ?badarg(foreach,[[], #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id([]), #{})),
  469:     ?badarg(foreach,[{}, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id({}), #{})),
  470:     ?badarg(foreach,[42, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(42), #{})),
  471:     ok.
  472: 
  473: t_iterator_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474: 
  475:     %% Small map test
  476:     M0 = #{ a => 1, b => 2 },
  477:     I0 = maps:iterator(M0),
  478:     {K1,V1,I1} = maps:next(I0),
  479:     {K2,V2,I2} = maps:next(I1),
  480:     none = maps:next(I2),
  481: 
  482:     KVList = lists:sort([{K1,V1},{K2,V2}]),
  483:     KVList = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M0)),
  484:     KList = lists:sort([K1,K2]),
  485:     KList = lists:sort(maps:keys(M0)),
  486: 
  487:     %% Large map test
  488: 
  489:     Vs2 = lists:seq(1,200),
  490:     M2 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs2]),
  491:     KVList2 = lists:sort(iter_kv(maps:iterator(M2))),
  492:     KVList2 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(maps:iterator(M2))),
  493:     KVList2 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M2)),
  494: 
  495:     %% Larger map test
  496: 
  497:     Vs3 = lists:seq(1,10000),
  498:     M3 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs3]),
  499:     KVList3 = lists:sort(iter_kv(maps:iterator(M3))),
  500:     KVList3 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(maps:iterator(M3))),
  501:     KVList3 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M3)),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: t_iterator_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  505: 
  506:     AOrdCmpFun = fun(A, B) -> A =< B end,
  507:     ARevCmpFun = fun(A, B) -> B =< A end,
  508: 
  509:     %% Small map test
  510:     M0 = #{ a => 1, b => 2 },
  511:     TOrdI0 = maps:iterator(M0, ordered),
  512:     {K1 = a, V1 = 1, TOrdI1} = maps:next(TOrdI0),
  513:     {K2 = b, V2 = 2, TOrdI2} = maps:next(TOrdI1),
  514:     none = maps:next(TOrdI2),
  515: 
  516:     TRevI0 = maps:iterator(M0, reversed),
  517:     {K2 = b, V2 = 2, TRevI1} = maps:next(TRevI0),
  518:     {K1 = a, V1 = 1, TRevI2} = maps:next(TRevI1),
  519:     none = maps:next(TRevI2),
  520: 
  521:     AOrdI0 = maps:iterator(M0, AOrdCmpFun),
  522:     {K1 = a, V1 = 1, AOrdI1} = maps:next(AOrdI0),
  523:     {K2 = b, V2 = 2, AOrdI2} = maps:next(AOrdI1),
  524:     none = maps:next(AOrdI2),
  525: 
  526:     ARevI0 = maps:iterator(M0, ARevCmpFun),
  527:     {K2 = b, V2 = 2, ARevI1} = maps:next(ARevI0),
  528:     {K1 = a, V1 = 1, ARevI2} = maps:next(ARevI1),
  529:     none = maps:next(ARevI2),
  530: 
  531:     OrdKVList = [{K1, V1}, {K2, V2}],
  532:     OrdKVList = maps:to_list(TOrdI0),
  533:     OrdKVList = maps:to_list(AOrdI0),
  534: 
  535:     RevKVList = [{K2, V2}, {K1, V1}],
  536:     RevKVList = maps:to_list(TRevI0),
  537:     RevKVList = maps:to_list(ARevI0),
  538: 
  539:     %% Large map test
  540: 
  541:     Vs2 = lists:seq(1, 200),
  542:     OrdKVList2 = [{{k, I}, I} || I <- Vs2],
  543:     M2 = maps:from_list(OrdKVList2),
  544:     ok = iterator_2_check_order(M2, ordered, reversed),
  545:     ok = iterator_2_check_order(M2, AOrdCmpFun, ARevCmpFun),
  546: 
  547:     %% Larger map test
  548: 
  549:     Vs3 = lists:seq(1, 10000),
  550:     OrdKVList3 = [{{k, I}, I} || I <- Vs3],
  551:     M3 = maps:from_list(OrdKVList3),
  552:     ok = iterator_2_check_order(M3, ordered, reversed),
  553:     ok = iterator_2_check_order(M3, AOrdCmpFun, ARevCmpFun),
  554: 
  555:     %% Float and integer keys
  556: 
  557:     M4 = #{-1.0 => a, 0.0 => b, -1 => c, 0 => d},
  558:     OrdIter4 = maps:iterator(M4, ordered),
  559:     [{-1, c}, {0, d}, {-1.0, a}, {0.0, b}] = maps:to_list(OrdIter4),
  560:     ok = iterator_2_check_order(M4, ordered, reversed),
  561: 
  562:     ok.
  563: 
  564: iterator_2_option_to_fun(ordered) ->
  565:     fun(A, B) -> erts_internal:cmp_term(A, B) =< 0 end;
  566: iterator_2_option_to_fun(reversed) ->
  567:     fun(A, B) -> erts_internal:cmp_term(B, A) =< 0 end;
  568: iterator_2_option_to_fun(F) when is_function(F, 2) ->
  569:     F.
  570: 
  571: iterator_2_check_order(M, OrdOption, RevOption) ->
  572:     OrdCmpFun = iterator_2_option_to_fun(OrdOption),
  573:     RevCmpFun = iterator_2_option_to_fun(RevOption),
  574:     OrdKVCmpFun = fun({A, _}, {B, _}) -> OrdCmpFun(A, B) end,
  575:     RevKVCmpFun = fun({A, _}, {B, _}) -> RevCmpFun(A, B) end,
  576: 
  577:     OrdKVList = lists:sort(OrdKVCmpFun, maps:to_list(M)),
  578:     RevKVList = lists:sort(RevKVCmpFun, maps:to_list(M)),
  579:     RevKVList = lists:reverse(OrdKVList),
  580: 
  581:     Iter = maps:iterator(M, undefined),
  582:     OrdIter = maps:iterator(M, OrdOption),
  583:     RevIter = maps:iterator(M, RevOption),
  584: 
  585:     OrdKVList = lists:sort(OrdKVCmpFun, iter_kv(Iter)),
  586:     OrdKVList = lists:sort(OrdKVCmpFun, maps:to_list(Iter)),
  587:     OrdKVList = iter_kv(OrdIter),
  588:     OrdKVList = maps:to_list(OrdIter),
  589: 
  590:     RevKVList = iter_kv(RevIter),
  591:     RevKVList = maps:to_list(RevIter),
  592: 
  593:     ok.
  594: 
  595: iter_kv(I) ->
  596:     case maps:next(I) of
  597:         none ->
  598:             [];
  599:         {K,V,NI} ->
  600:             [{K,V} | iter_kv(NI)]
  601:     end.
  602: 
  603: t_iterator_valid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  604:     %% good iterators created via maps:iterator
  605:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{})),
  606:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b})),
  607:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b, c => d})),
  608:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{}, undefined)),
  609:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b}, undefined)),
  610:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b, c => d}, undefined)),
  611:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{}, ordered)),
  612:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b}, ordered)),
  613:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b, c => d}, ordered)),
  614:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{}, reversed)),
  615:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b}, reversed)),
  616:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b, c => d}, reversed)),
  617:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{}, fun erlang:'=<'/2)),
  618:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b}, fun erlang:'=<'/2)),
  619:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(maps:iterator(#{a => b, c => d}, fun erlang:'=<'/2)),
  620: 
  621:     %% good makeshift iterators
  622:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid(none),
  623:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, none}),
  624:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, {c, d, none}}),
  625:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, {c, d, {e, f, none}}}),
  626:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, maps:iterator(#{})}),
  627:     true = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, maps:iterator(#{c => d})}),
  628: 
  629:     %% not iterators
  630:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(no_iter),
  631:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(1),
  632:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(1.0),
  633:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid([]),
  634:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid("foo"),
  635:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(<<"foo">>),
  636:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(fun() -> ok end),
  637:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(self()),
  638:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(make_ref()),
  639:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid(#{}),
  640:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid({}),
  641:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid({a}),
  642:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b}),
  643:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, c, d}),
  644: 
  645:     %% bad makeshift iterators that only fail on later (ie, subsequent) calls to maps:next/1
  646:     %%    maps:next({a, b, c}) -> {a, b, c}
  647:     %%    maps:next(c) -> badarg
  648:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, c}),
  649:     %%    maps:next({a, b, {c, d, e}}) -> {a, b, {c, d, e}}
  650:     %%    maps:next({c, d, e}) -> {c, d, e}
  651:     %%    maps:next(e) -> badarg
  652:     false = maps:is_iterator_valid({a, b, {c, d, e}}),
  653: 
  654:     ok.
  655: 
  656: t_put_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  657:     Value = id(#{complex => map}),
  658:     Small = id(#{a => Value}),
  659:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:put(a, Value, Small), Small),
  660: 
  661:     LargeBase = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,200)]),
  662:     Large = LargeBase#{a => Value},
  663:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:put(a, Value, Large), Large),
  664:     ok.
  665: 
  666: t_merge_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  667:     Small = id(#{a => 1}),
  668:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(#{}, Small), Small),
  669:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Small, #{}), Small),
  670:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Small, Small), Small),
  671: 
  672:     Large = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,200)]),
  673:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(#{}, Large), Large),
  674:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Large, #{}), Large),
  675:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Large, Large), Large),
  676: 
  677:     List = id([a|b]),
  678:     ?badmap([a|b],merge,[[a|b],[a|b]]) = (catch maps:merge(List, List)),
  679: 
  680:     ok.
  681: 
  682: random_map(SizeConstant, InitSeed) ->
  683:     {Ret, _} =
  684:         lists:foldl(
  685:           fun(_, {Map, Seed}) ->
  686:                   rand:uniform_s(Seed),
  687:                   {K, Seed2} = rand:uniform_s(SizeConstant, Seed),
  688:                   {V, Seed3} = rand:uniform_s(SizeConstant*100, Seed2),
  689:                   {Map#{K => V}, Seed3}
  690:           end,
  691:           {#{}, rand:seed_s(exsss, SizeConstant + InitSeed)},
  692:           lists:seq(1, SizeConstant)),
  693:     Ret.
  694: 
  695: check_map_combiners_same_small(MapCombiner1, MapCombiner2, Seed) ->
  696:     lists:foreach(
  697:       fun(SizeConstant) ->
  698:               lists:foreach(
  699:                 fun(SeedMult) ->
  700:                    RandMap1 = random_map(SizeConstant,
  701:                                          SizeConstant + 100000*SeedMult + Seed),
  702:                    RandMap2 = random_map(SizeConstant,
  703:                                          SizeConstant + 200000*SeedMult + Seed),
  704:                    Comb1Res = MapCombiner1(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  705:                    Comb2Res = MapCombiner2(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  706:                    Comb1Res = Comb2Res
  707:                 end,
  708:                 lists:seq(1,100))
  709: 
  710:       end,
  711:       lists:seq(1,10)).
  712: 
  713: 
  714: check_map_combiners_same_large(MapCombiner1, MapCombiner2, Seed) ->
  715:     lists:foreach(
  716:       fun(SizeConstant) ->
  717:               RandMap1 = random_map(SizeConstant, SizeConstant + Seed),
  718:               RandMap2 = random_map(SizeConstant, SizeConstant + Seed),
  719:               Comb1Res = MapCombiner1(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  720:               Comb2Res = MapCombiner2(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  721:               Comb1Res = Comb2Res
  722:       end,
  723:       [1000, 10000]),
  724:     ok.
  725: 
  726: t_merge_with(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  727:     Small = #{1 => 1, 2 => 3},
  728:     Large = #{1 => 3, 2 => 2, 10=>10},
  729:     #{1 := {1,3}, 2 := {3,2}, 10 := 10} =
  730:         maps:merge_with(fun(1, 1, 3) -> {1, 3};
  731:                            (2, 3, 2) -> {3, 2}
  732:                         end,
  733:                         Small,
  734:                         Large),
  735: 
  736:     %% Swapping input maps should reverse tuples
  737: 
  738:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}, 10 := 10} =
  739:         maps:merge_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2};
  740:                            (2, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2}
  741:                         end,
  742:                         Large,
  743:                         Small),
  744: 
  745:     %% Swapping parameters in the output of the fun should also reverse
  746:     %% tuples
  747: 
  748:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}, 10 := 10} =
  749:         maps:merge_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1};
  750:                            (2, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1}
  751:                         end,
  752:                         Small,
  753:                         Large),
  754: 
  755:     %% Should give the same result as maps:merge/2 with the right combiner
  756: 
  757:     DefaultCombiner = fun(_, _, V2) -> V2 end,
  758:     Merge2FromMerge3 = fun (M1, M2) -> maps:merge_with(DefaultCombiner, M1, M2) end,
  759:     check_map_combiners_same_small(fun maps:merge/2, Merge2FromMerge3, 1),
  760:     check_map_combiners_same_large(fun maps:merge/2, Merge2FromMerge3, 2),
  761: 
  762:     %% Should conceptually compute the same thing as
  763:     %% lists:ukey_merge/2 with the right combiner
  764: 
  765:     MergeFromUKeyMerge =
  766:         fun(M1, M2) ->
  767:                 L1 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M1)),
  768:                 L2 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M2)),
  769:                 %% ukeymerge takes from the first when collision
  770:                 ResList = lists:ukeymerge(1, L2, L1),
  771:                 maps:from_list(ResList)
  772:         end,
  773:     check_map_combiners_same_small(MergeFromUKeyMerge, Merge2FromMerge3, 3),
  774:     check_map_combiners_same_large(MergeFromUKeyMerge, Merge2FromMerge3, 4),
  775: 
  776:     %% Empty maps
  777: 
  778:     Large = maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  779:                             Large,
  780:                             #{}),
  781:     Large = maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  782:                             #{},
  783:                             Large),
  784:     #{} = maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  785:                           #{},
  786:                           #{}),
  787: 
  788:     %% Errors
  789: 
  790:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  791:         (catch maps:merge_with(not_a_fun,#{},#{})),
  792:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  793:         (catch maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end, a, #{})),
  794:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, b}, _}} =
  795:         (catch maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, #{}, b)),
  796:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  797:         (catch maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, a, b)),
  798:     ok.
  799: 
  800: t_intersect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  801:     Small = #{1 => 1, 2 => 3},
  802:     Large = #{1 => 3, 2 => 2, 10=>10},
  803:     #{1 := 3,2 := 2} = maps:intersect(Small, Large),
  804: 
  805:     %% Swapping input maps can make a difference
  806: 
  807:     #{1 := 1, 2 := 3} = maps:intersect(Large, Small),
  808: 
  809:     %% Should conceptually compute the same thing as
  810:     %% gb_sets:intersect/2 with the right combiner
  811: 
  812:     IntersectFromGBSets =
  813:         fun(M1, M2) ->
  814:                 Map1Keys = maps:keys(M1),
  815:                 Map2Keys = maps:keys(M2),
  816:                 GBSet1 = gb_sets:from_list(Map1Keys),
  817:                 GBSet2 = gb_sets:from_list(Map2Keys),
  818:                 GBSetIntersection = gb_sets:intersection(GBSet1, GBSet2),
  819:                 IntersectList = gb_sets:to_list(GBSetIntersection),
  820:                 lists:foldl(
  821:                   fun(Key, SoFar) ->
  822:                           SoFar#{Key => maps:get(Key, M2)}
  823:                   end,
  824:                   #{},
  825:                   IntersectList)
  826:         end,
  827:     check_map_combiners_same_small(fun maps:intersect/2,
  828:                                    IntersectFromGBSets,
  829:                                    11),
  830:     check_map_combiners_same_large(fun maps:intersect/2,
  831:                                    IntersectFromGBSets,
  832:                                    13),
  833: 
  834:     %% Empty maps
  835: 
  836:     #{} = maps:intersect(Large, #{}),
  837:     #{} = maps:intersect(#{}, Large),
  838:     #{} = maps:intersect(#{}, #{}),
  839: 
  840:     %% Errors
  841: 
  842:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  843:         (catch maps:intersect(a, #{})),
  844:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, b}, _}} =
  845:         (catch maps:intersect(#{}, b)),
  846:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  847:         (catch maps:intersect(a, b)),
  848:     ok.
  849: 
  850: t_intersect_with(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  851:     Small = #{1 => 1, 2 => 3},
  852:     Large = #{1 => 3, 2 => 2, 10=>10},
  853:     #{1 := {1,3}, 2 := {3,2}} =
  854:         maps:intersect_with(fun(1, 1, 3) -> {1, 3};
  855:                                (2, 3, 2) -> {3, 2}
  856:                             end,
  857:                             Small,
  858:                             Large),
  859: 
  860:     %% Swapping input maps should reverse tuples
  861: 
  862:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}} =
  863:         maps:intersect_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2};
  864:                                (2, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2}
  865:                             end,
  866:                             Large,
  867:                             Small),
  868: 
  869:     %% Swapping parameters in the output of the fun should also reverse
  870:     %% tuples
  871: 
  872:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}} =
  873:         maps:intersect_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1};
  874:                                (2, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1}
  875:                             end,
  876:                             Small,
  877:                             Large),
  878: 
  879:     %% Should give the same result as intersect/2 with the right combiner
  880: 
  881:     DefaultCombiner = fun(_, _, V2) -> V2 end,
  882:     Intersect2FromIntersect3 =
  883:         fun (M1, M2) -> maps:intersect_with(DefaultCombiner, M1, M2) end,
  884:     check_map_combiners_same_small(fun maps:intersect/2,
  885:                                    Intersect2FromIntersect3,
  886:                                    7),
  887:     check_map_combiners_same_large(fun maps:intersect/2,
  888:                                    Intersect2FromIntersect3,
  889:                                    8),
  890: 
  891:     %% Empty maps
  892: 
  893:     #{} = maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  894:                               Large,
  895:                               #{}),
  896:     #{} = maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  897:                               #{},
  898:                               Large),
  899:     #{} = maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  900:                               #{},
  901:                               #{}),
  902: 
  903:     %% Errors
  904: 
  905:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  906:         (catch maps:intersect_with(not_a_fun,#{},#{})),
  907:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  908:         (catch maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end, a, #{})),
  909:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, b}, _}} =
  910:         (catch maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, #{}, b)),
  911:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  912:         (catch maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, a, b)),
  913:     ok.
  914: 
  915: t_size_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  916:       0 = maps:size(#{}),
  917:      10 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,10)])),
  918:      20 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,20)])),
  919:      30 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,30)])),
  920:      40 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,40)])),
  921:      50 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,50)])),
  922:      60 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,60)])),
  923:     600 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,600)])),
  924: 
  925:     %% error case
  926:     %%
  927:     %% Note that the stack trace is ignored because the compiler may have
  928:     %% rewritten maps:size/2 to map_size.
  929:     {'EXIT', {{badmap,a}, _}} = (catch maps:size(id(a))),
  930:     {'EXIT', {{badmap,<<>>}, _}} = (catch maps:size(id(<<>>))),
  931:     ok.
  932: 
  933: t_groups_from_list(_Config) ->
  934:     #{} = maps:groups_from_list(fun erlang:length/1, []),
  935:     #{3 := ["tna","tac"], 5 := ["ognid"], 7 := ["olaffub"]} =
  936:         maps:groups_from_list(
  937:           fun erlang:length/1,
  938:           fun lists:reverse/1,
  939:           ["ant", "buffalo", "cat", "dingo"]
  940:          ),
  941:     #{0 := [2], 1 := [1, 3]} = maps:groups_from_list(fun(X) -> X rem 2 end, [1, 2, 3]).
  942: 
  943: error_info(_Config) ->
  944:     BadIterator = [-1|#{}],
  945:     BadIterator2 = {x, y, z},
  946:     GoodIterator = maps:iterator(#{}),
  947:     BadOrder = fun(_) -> true end,
  948:     GoodOrder = fun(A, B) -> A =< B end,
  949: 
  950:     L = [
  951:          {filter, [fun(_, _) -> true end, abc]},
  952:          {filter, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator]},
  953:          {filter, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator2]},
  954:          {filter, [bad_fun, BadIterator],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  955:          {filter, [bad_fun, BadIterator2],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  956:          {filter, [bad_fun, GoodIterator]},
  957: 
  958:          {filtermap, [fun(_, _) -> true end, abc]},
  959:          {filtermap, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator]},
  960:          {filtermap, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator2]},
  961:          {filtermap, [fun(_) -> true end, GoodIterator]},
  962:          {filtermap, [fun(_) -> ok end, #{}]},
  963: 
  964:          {find, [key, no_map]},
  965: 
  966:          {fold, [fun(_, _, _) -> true end, init, abc]},
  967:          {fold, [fun(_, _, _) -> true end, init, BadIterator]},
  968:          {fold, [fun(_, _, _) -> true end, init, BadIterator2]},
  969:          {fold, [fun(_) -> true end, init, GoodIterator]},
  970:          {fold, [fun(_) -> ok end, init, #{}]},
  971: 
  972:          {foreach, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, no_map]},
  973:          {foreach, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, BadIterator]},
  974:          {foreach, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, BadIterator2]},
  975:          {foreach, [fun(_) -> ok end, GoodIterator]},
  976:          {foreach, [fun(_) -> ok end, #{}]},
  977: 
  978:          {from_keys, [#{a => b}, whatever]},
  979:          {from_keys, [[a|b], whatever]},
  980: 
  981:          {from_list, [#{a => b}]},
  982:          {from_list, [[a|b]]},
  983: 
  984:          {get, [key, #{}]},
  985:          {get, [key, {no,map}]},
  986:          {get, [key, {no,map}, default]},
  987: 
  988:          {groups_from_list, [not_a_fun, []]},
  989:          {groups_from_list, [fun hd/1, not_a_list]},
  990: 
  991:          {groups_from_list, [not_a_fun, fun(_) -> ok end, []]},
  992:          {groups_from_list, [fun(_) -> ok end, not_a_fun, []]},
  993:          {groups_from_list, [fun(_) -> ok end, fun(_) -> ok end, not_a_list]},
  994: 
  995:          {intersect, [#{a => b}, y]},
  996:          {intersect, [x, #{a => b}]},
  997:          {intersect, [x, y],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  998: 
  999:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _, _) -> ok end, #{a => b}, y]},
 1000:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _, _) -> ok end, x, #{a => b}]},
 1001:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _, _) -> ok end, x, y],[{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1002:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, #{}, #{}]},
 1003: 
 1004:          {is_iterator_valid, [GoodIterator], [no_fail]},
 1005:          {is_iterator_valid, [BadIterator], [no_fail]},
 1006:          {is_iterator_valid, [BadIterator2], [no_fail]},
 1007: 
 1008:          {is_key,[key, no_map]},
 1009: 
 1010:          {iterator,[{no,map}]},
 1011:

 1013:          {iterator, [{no,map}, ordered], [{1, ".*"}]},
 1014:          {iterator, [{no,map}, reversed], [{1, ".*"}]},
 1015:          {iterator, [{no,map}, GoodOrder], [{1, ".*"}]},
 1016:          {iterator, [#{a => b}, BadOrder], [{2, ".*"}]},

 1018: 
 1019:          {keys, [{no,map}]},
 1020: 
 1021:          {map, [fun(_, _) -> true end, abc]},
 1022:          {map, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator]},
 1023:          {map, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator2]},
 1024:          {map, [fun(_) -> true end, GoodIterator]},

 1067: id(I) -> I.
